snippet: COHEN--Charles. Charles passed away June 19, 2016 at the age of 81. While professionally a periodontist and implantologist, he was a true Renaissance man. Eagle Scout, Order of the Arrow, birder, photographer, sculptor, painter, archaeologist, he was a lifelong student and teacher. He was past president of the Mohegan Park Jewish Center where he was for many years the shofar blower. At Congregation Kehillat Jeshurun, he was a charter member of the Chevra Kadisha, past president of the Men's Club and longtime lyricist for the KJ players. He is survived by his loving wife, Ellen Dede, his children Deena (Sammy) Zimmerman, Matthew (Sharon Koren) Cohen, Jessica (Richard) Langer and twelve grandchildren. He will be greatly missed. 1/3
